Klub Otomotif Akan Kawal Jenazah Afridza Menuju Kediaman
04 Nov 2019, 12:20 by Nova Nugraha Putra


Klub Otomotif Akan Kawal Jenazah Afridza Menuju Kediaman

KBRN, Tasikmalaya : Jenazah Afridza Syach (20) pembalap Asian Talent Cup (ATC) yang meninggal di sirkuit Sepang Malaysia, dijadwalkan tiba di Indonesia Senin (4/11/2019).Jenazah Afridza akan dibawa dari Jakarta ke Kota Tasikmalaya, Jawa Barat, sekitar pukul 14.00 wib, melalui jalan darat.Kepulangan jenazah Afridza akan mendapat pengawalan pihak kepolisian, termasuk Polres Tasikmalaya Kota.Kapolres Tasikmalaya Kota AKBP. Anom Karibianto menjelaskan, pengawalan yang dilakukan merupakan bentuk perhatian terhadap sosok berbakat ini."Kami akan kawal agar perjalanan jenazah berjalan lancar," kata Anom kepada Radio Republik Indonesia RRI, Senin (4/11/2019).Selain pihak kepolisian, Anom menambahkan, jenazah Afridza juga akan dikawal oleh klub otomotif di Tasikmalaya."Ada berbagai klub yang nantinya menyambut kedatangan jenazah Afridza," tambahnya.Sementara itu di kediaman keluarga Afridza di Perum Tamansari Indah Kecamatan Kawalu, Kota Tasikmalaya, berbagai persiapan telah dilakukan.Afridza, akan dimakamkan di makam keluarga di Kampung Sambong Bencoy, Kecamatan Kawalu.Kematian Afridza, meninggalkan duka mendalam bagi keluarga, termasuk luka warga Kota Tasikmalaya.Berbagai ucapan belasungkawa bahkan doa bersama juga dilakukan puluhan anggota DPRR Kota Tasikmalaya untuk Afridza.

Automotive Club Will Escort Afridza's Body Towards Residence
04 Nov 2019, 12:20 by Nova Nugraha Putra


Automotive Club Will Escort Afridza's Body Towards Residence

KBRN, Tasikmalaya: Bodies of Afridza Syach (20) Asian Talent Cup (ATC) racer who died at the Sepang Malaysia circuit, is scheduled to arrive in Indonesia Monday (4/11/2019). Afridza's body will be taken from Jakarta to Tasikmalaya City, West Java, around 2:00 p.m., by road. Afridza's corpse will be escorted by the police, including the City Police Tasikmalaya. The City Police Tasikmalaya AKBP. Anom Karibianto explained that the escort carried out was a form of attention to this talented figure. "We will guard the corpse to run smoothly," Anom told RRI Radio Republik Indonesia on Monday (11/04/2019). Besides the police, Anom added, Afridza's body will also be escorted by an automotive club in Tasikmalaya. "There are various clubs that will welcome Afridza's body," he added. at the family grave in Sambong Bencoy village, Kawalu sub-district. The death of Afridza, left a deep sorrow for the family, including the injuries of Tasikmalaya City residents. Various condolences and even prayers were also carried out by dozens of members of the Tasikmalaya City DPRR for Afridza.
